text: Oles Buzina (; 13 July 1969 - 16 April 2015) was a Ukrainian journalist, writer, and politician for the pro-Russia Russian Bloc party. He was a journalist for the Russian language tabloid newspaper Segodnya. Buzina was born in Kyiv. In 1992, he graduated from Taras Shevchenko National University of Kyiv. He was married and had a daughter. Buzina was shot and killed by masked men on 16 April 2015 in Kyiv, aged 45. ==References== Category:1969 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Ukrainian journalists Category:Murders by firearm Category:Politicians from Kyiv Category:Writers from Kyiv Category:Television presenters
title: Oles Buzina
